name: Deep Cleaning
descriptionLarge: Our deep cleaning service is your answer to a meticulously clean and rejuvenated living space. Whether you're preparing for a special event, transitioning to a new season, or simply want to maintain a pristine home, our dedicated team of cleaning experts is here to transform your space.
descriptionShort: Rejuvanate your space with our comprenhensive and meticuluos deep cleaning service.

recommendations.frequency: We recommend a deep cleaning service at least two times per month.

name: Office Cleaning
descriptionLarge: Our office cleaning service is designed to meet the needs of businesses, large and small, to ensure your workspace remains not only clean but also conducive to productivity and employee well-being
descriptionShort: Meet the goals of your business with our help, by assuring a pristine, hygienic, and inviting environment for all.

recommendations.frequency: We recommend an office cleaning service at least once a week
